akas from release info: Ο ΑΛΒΙΝΝΝ!!! και η παρέα του Greece

1.title: Alvin's new CHIPMUNK/Lin Yong's first day at school
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Talkin' Teddy/Principal Interest
1.plot: Principal Interest: Alvin falls for the new Principal. Talkin' Teddy: Alvin and Simon rewire Theodore's latest toy.

2.title: A Is for Aliens/Jeanette Enchanted
2.plot: A is for Aliens: Alvin suspects Theodore was taken by aliens. Jeanette Enchanted: Jeanette gets to make "magic" for a day, but it goes too far.

3.title: Sister Act/Li'l T
3.plot: Sister Act: Eleanor moves into the boys room and causes serious problems! Li'l T: Theodore gets thrown into the hip-hop industry.

4.title: What a Gem/Family Spirit
4.plot: What a Gem: Alvin suspects the cranky neighbor next door is up to no good. Family Spirit: Alvin tries to get out of going to a family picnic so he can go to the big soccer match.

5.title: The App/Don Juan Theodoro
5.plot: When Dave gets a parenting APP to help supervise The Chipmunks, Alvin tries everything to escape its control./Alvin, Simon and the Chipettes give Theodore conflicting dating tips when they believe he has a crush on a girl. Will our little Romeo be able to make sense of all this?

6.title: AlBrittina/Simon for President
6.plot: When Alvin catches Simon taking a personality test to discover his soul-mate, he decides to do the same and prove just how silly the test really is. But when the test reveals that his own soul-mate is...Brittany, Alvin decides to do something dramatic and becomes a bow tie wearing preppy!/Tired of Bocarter Humphrey, the class president, favoring his personal pals, Simon and Alvin decide to rebel and launch their own campaigns for class president. Will brotherhood survive the competition?

7.title: To Serve and Protect/Kicking It Old School
7.plot: Simon is ecstatic when he's elected as the school's safety monitor and gets to choose the destination of the upcoming family vacation. But when Alvin goofs off at school, Simon faces a moral dilemma, and has to choose between doing the right thing or giving Alvin detention and ruining the family vacation./Fed up with seeing how dependent The Chipmunks have become on their technology, Dave decides to take them camping for a weekend, without electricity, cell service or the Internet. But what seems like a good idea turns into a nightmare for Dave and our boys.

8.title: Clowning Around/Bully for You
8.plot: Theodore is desperate to land the part of the monster in the school play, so Alvin decides to show Theodore how to really scare people. But Alvin scares him so badly, that poor Theodore freezes like a statue. Can Alvin and Simon unfreeze Theodore before the big audition?/When an accident forces Simon to wear his embarrassing old glasses, he becomes the target of the school bully. Unwilling to remain a victim, Simon builds a homemade robot bodyguard that helps Simon stand up to the bullies.

9.title: My Sister the Weirdo/Turf War
9.plot: Jeanette wants to give a toast to Brittany at her upcoming party. But Jeanette is so shy, she seeks advice from the most confident person she knows...ALVIN. But his advice embarrasses Brittany to the point where she decides not to invite Jeanette to her party./Needing to find a part time job in order to buy the latest video game, Alvin decides to "borrow" Brittany's baby-sitting job. But Basil, a sensitive little 6 year old boy, is not too thrilled at having Alvin look after him. So he decides to put Alvin through the wringer!

10.title: Good Luck Mr. Whiskers/Who's Your Daddy
10.plot: Theodore is convinced that Miss Croner's, missing cat is the cause of a terrible curse. And the only way to break the curse is to find Mister Whiskers./When Dave comes down with a bad cold, Alvin quickly offers to take over Dad duty. But he quickly learns that parenting is a lot harder than he ever imagined.

11.title: Mystic Mountain/Candy Confessions
11.plot: Dave is concerned that The Chipmunks have become too obsessed with their latest video game. But when they challenge Dave to play the game before judging it, Dave becomes even more addicted than The Chipmunks./Grounded once again, Alvin begs Theodore to buy him the limited edition skateboard he's always wanted. But, Theodore gets sidetracked by his sweet tooth and squanders all of Alvin's money on candy instead. Now Theodore is forced to tell the truth or make up an improbable story.

12.title: Mojo Missing/Who's the Animal
12.plot: In a rare moment of generosity, Alvin gives his beloved cap to a fan. But soon he's convinced his mojo was in his cap, and must find a way to get his hat back before the Chipmunks' big concert./During a costume visit to the zoo, Alvin finds himself mistaken for a real Tasmanian devil. Soon, Alvin is stuck in the Tasmanian devil's cage and the real animal, goes home to the Sevilles'. The mix-up creates problems all around, especially when Simon reads that the Tasmanian devil is scheduled for surgery. Can Dave and the boys get to Alvin before the operation?!

13.title: Slippin' Thru My Fingers/Driving Dave Crazy
13.plot: Dave can't help but notice that his three little Chipmunks are growing up and becoming independent. Anxious to spend more time with them, he only ends up suffocating them. In order to get Dave off their backs, the Chipmunks decide to find him a new girlfriend./While Dave is working on an important new song for the music festival, the Chipmunks are upstairs making a mess of their bedroom. Dave orders them to clean their room. But in the process, they accidentally ruin Dave's new song. Can they fix it in time for the big performance?

14.title: Safety Third/Mister Manners
14.plot: When Alvin hears about a dangerous toy sports car then Dave showing him it's dangerous Alvin tries to make safe stuff look dangerous. When Alvin makes Simon make the toy car Alvin takes it for a ride.

15.title: Tree House/Saving Simon
15.plot: While cleaning out their treehouse, the girls remember how they saved the tree from being cut down, and made it their home. / Believing Simon is going away to a boarding school, Alvin and Theodore do all they can to thwart his departure and keep him at home.

16.title: Back to School/Bromance
16.plot: When Dave discovers he didn't graduate from high school, he finds himself in school with Alvin. Talk about the Odd Couple. / Simon has found a new best friend, Jamie. He's smart, funny, and shares Simon's love of Science. But when Jamie realizes that Alvin is the more popular brother, he ditches Simon to get in with the cool crowd. Can the brothers survive this new friend?

17.title: A Room of One's Own/Carts and Crafts
17.plot: After squabbling with his brothers, Alvin convinces Dave to give him his own room, but soon realizes living alone isn't what it's cracked up to be. / When Alvin inadvertently destroys Theodore's bicycle, he enters the boys in a roundup of shopping carts where the first prize is a new bike.

18.title: Going Green/Tattle Tail
18.plot: The Chipmunks and Chipettes try to reduce their carbon footprint when Jeanette signs them up for a Green Living competition. / Alvin is so taken with a girl at school, that he agrees to look after her talking Mina bird. But when Alvin says something damaging, he worries the bird will repeat it to the girl and must find a way to keep the bird from blabbing.

19.title: Super Heroes/She's Got Style
19.plot: When Theodore thinks he's a real superhero, Alvin and Simon have a tough time convincing him to leave the crime fighting to the professionals. / Brittany is humiliated by Jeanette's lack of style. That is, until Jeanette is proclaimed a fashion trendsetter by Brittany's style icon. Now Brittany wants to prove she's more stylish than her sister.

20.title: Kiss Conspiracy/House Guest
20.plot: Simon is too embarrassed to kiss his co-star in the school play. So in a moment of desperation, he agrees to allow Alvin to switch identities with him. But to Alvin's dismay, Simon is now credited for "the kiss" and is overrun by all the girls in the school. / Anxious to give Dave a much-needed rest, Alvin secretly decides to rent out their house for a Hawaiian home-swap. Problem is, the houseguests show up early while Dave is still home.

21.title: Theozilla/Doggone It
21.plot: When a science project goes wrong Alvin and Simon have a big problem: Theodore.

22.title: Mutiny/Reality or Not
22.plot: Desperate to avenge last year's humiliating loss, The Chipmunks argue over who is best suited to lead them to victory. / Alvin is tired of seeing his celebrity status overshadowed by Reality TV stars. So, he decides to become one himself. Just one problem, Alvin has to film Dave without him knowing.

23.title: Let Them Eat Crumbs/Who Ghosts There
23.plot: It's the big Bake-Off, and Eleanor has prepared her signature cake and left it out to cool. But Brittany and Alvin come home, and eat the cake without knowing its importance! Can they re-make the cake in time? Or will Eleanor's dreams be reduced to crumbs? / The boys are worried that Dave will move the family to his dream house and decide to make the house seem haunted to thwart the sale.

24.title: Alvin's Secret Powers/Warbie
24.plot: In order to get Theodore to do his bidding, Alvin tells him that he has secret powers and can turn trash into candy.

25.title: I Will Survive/Alvin's Got a Brand New Bag
25.plot: When Alvin is set to appear on a reality show but injures himself, Simon must train in order to beat his competition: Derek; Alvin must find a way to give Brittany a new bag after he inadvertently destroys her old one.

26.title: Art for Art's Sake/Mancave
26.plot: Brittany takes up painting to her fashion idol; Dave's Hurt his but moved, Alvin tries to stop julie from moving in.

1.title: Dog Days/Dragon Dad
1.plot: When the chipmunks find a stray dog, the boys do everything they can do hide it from Dave so they can keep it; Theodore buys an egg online in hopes it will hatch into a dragon, but Alvin and Simon do not believe his wish will come true.

2.title: Members Only/The New Kid
2.plot: When Alvin attempts to help the Mathletes stand up to bullies, they take their newfound confidence too far. After witnessing what appears to be a wallet theft commited by Alvin's new friend, a foreign student named Emil, Simon and Theodore decide to investigate in hopes of finding answers - and, perhaps, justice.

3.title: Simon the Superb/The Sub
3.plot: Alvin and Simon compete to determine who is a better magician. In order to pay off a fine, Alvin takes a job as a music teacher.

4.title: Lights Camera Uh-Oh/Wax Dave
4.plot: After watching a horror film involving hot wax, the boys fear Dave has been caught up in a similar story.

5.title: Brittany the Body Snatcher/Agent Smith
5.plot: After Brittany overhears Alvin standing up for her, she begins to behave in a peculiar manner that leads Alvin to believe that she has been possessed by a body-snatcher. To land Simon a position on the school newspaper, Alvin and Theodore search for a groundbreaking story, discovering some interesting things about their teacher in the process.

6.title: Baby Whisperer/Let's Make a Deal
6.plot: Alvin goes to drastic measures to impress a girl he sees babysitting at the park. Alvin takes on numerous favors in order to do something special for Dave.

7.title: Munk Man/Ride Along
7.plot:

8.title: Alvin's Wild Weekend/For Whom the Bell Tolls
8.plot: A professional hypnotiser accidentally hypnotises Simon a few days before the B.U.T.T.

9.title: iHear/Switch Witch
9.plot:

10.title: Double Trouble/Liar Liar
10.plot: Alvin accidentally clones himself/A small lie turns into a giant one that everyone knows about

11.title: Suck Toad/Secret Admirer
11.plot: Brittany gets a Suck Toad stuck to her face/The Chipmunks think that Kevin has a crush on one of the Chipettes. The girls annoy him to get him to stop liking them

12.title: Un-Send!/The Orb
12.plot: Simon accidentally sends a rude email to one of his teachers/Simon makes Theodore a No-Buddy to get him to stop saying yes to everything

13.title: The Music Box/Special Delivery
13.plot: Theodore accidentally gives a special music box to the principal of their school

14.title: Missing Miss Smith/Monster Madness
14.plot: Miss Smith quits her job and Alvin tries to get her back/The Chipettes post a video of a very scared Simon and Alvin on the internet

15.title: Super Girls/Held Back
15.plot: The Chipettes try to show the boys that girls can be superheroes too/Alvin is held back a year in school and tries to get Simon and Theodore to join him

16.title: It's My Party/Keeping Up with the Humphries
16.plot: Kevin fears his birthday party will be lame so Alvin decides to host a paintball party in his house. After learning about Bocarter's New Computer, The chipmunks decide to build a bigger and better one in order to beat him at his own game.

1.title: Karate Kidder/Playing Favorites
1.plot: Simon, Theodore and Dave dry to prevent Alvin from going to the karate championship as they fear he might get hurt. Alvin and Theodore believe that Simon is dave's favorite so they try to prove that they can beat Simon at anything

2.title: Back to Basics; Report Cards
2.plot: After Simon fails a test , he decides to go on strike and that includes moving into a tree but the chipmunks and chippettes try to convince him to come back. Alvin fears that once Dave has read his report card , he won't get his new video game so he tries everything to make sure that Dave doesn't receive his report card.

3.title: The Cat Sitter; Addicted
3.plot: Miss Croner leaves Theodore in charge of looking after her cats while she's gone out of town but he can't let his brothers or Dave find out / the chipettes think that the chipmunks are all addicted to one item they each like but they disagree so they do a test to see who can go the longest without touching their favorite items.

4.title: Spoiler-Itis/Something Fishy
4.plot: The chipmunks and chippetes think that alvin spoils shows but Alvin disagrees so they all bet that Alvin can't stop talking for 24 hours but he proves them wrong / Theodore wins a goldfish at a fair and loves it so much but Alvin and Simon thinks that he might be dead so go out to replace him.

5.title: Baby Mama Drama/Ballet Boys
5.plot: Miss smiths pairs everyone in the class up to look after their own robot baby in order to experience a parents life but Alvin and Brittany struggle with the task. The coach decides to enroll Alvin , Simon and Theodore into a ballet class as their team can't beat Derek's team.

6.title: Oh Brother Where Art Thou; The Wall
6.plot: Theodore shows Alvin what life without Simon would be like but Alvin finds it quite boring. Theodore is winning the contest of the cutest chipmunks but Alvin tries everything he can think of to make sure he gets declared as the cutest chipmunk.

7.title: The Gift/Theo Knows Best

8.title: Simsky/Lucky Day
8.plot: Someone has been painting all of the walls and it is up to the chipmunks and chippettes to find out who it is / Theodore finds a lucky clover and explains that lucky things happen to him when he's holding the lucky clover, everyone believes it except Alvin but afterwards he wants it.

11.title: Independence Day/Opposites Attract
11.plot: When the chipmunks get tired of Dave always telling them what to do , they decide to build a tree house in the backyard and live in it, when Simons experiment goes wrong, Alvin and Simon are magnetized to each other and struggle to cope with each other but they can't let anyone find out especially dave.

12.title: Temporary Mom/Tee Fore Two
12.plot: When Alvin, Simon and Theodore get stuck with miss Miller as a babysitter, they decide to get someone new but all of their choices aren't at all like they hoped they would be. When Alvin and miss smith get paired up they struggle to work together but in the end they found out that they're better working as a team.

imdb.plot outline: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say "ALVINNN!!!". The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.
imdb.title: Alvinnn!!! And the Chipmunks
plot: A single dad has his hands full raising six rambunctious chipmunks in this animated comedy.

The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say "ALVINNN!!!". The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

A revival of the classic show from the 80s centers on music writer/composer and single dad Dave Seville raising three young sons Alvin, Simon, and Theodore: Three musically talented and famous chipmunk brothers who get into all sorts of shenanigans as they deal with modern day issues and the every day life lessons.::America Valencia
